title: Is there a technology that stores data in battery? - Quora

response.answer_text: As of current, I am not aware of the technology that is in use today, however you quite often hear about memory on older nicad type rechargeable batteries. It was a characteristic of this type of battery that if you did not fully discharge the battery before you recharged it, then it would get what was called a memory where it would not fully charge to as much capacity to hold power. We now have better lithium- ion batteries that at least do not have this characteristic...
